items.sentence: If you had stayed here, you would have had a very good time.
Tom divorced Mary after the children graduated from college.
Tom has to stay in the house because he has the chicken pox.
Tom meant to tell Mary about it, but he never saw her again.
Tom doesn\'t want you to share this information with anyone.
Tom followed in his father\'s footsteps and became a lawyer.
Tom is a New Yorker, but he doesn\'t have a New York accent.
Tom drank a glass of schnapps before he went to the dentist.
Tom eats pizza with a fork, but Mary eats it with her hands.
Mary never leaves her house without first putting on makeup.
